00037 #include "egs_polygon.h"
00038 
00039 bool EGS_2DPolygon::checkCCW(const vector<EGS_2DVector> &points) {
00040     double A = 0;
00041     for(int j=0; j<points.size()-1; j++)
00042         A += (points[j].x*points[j+1].y - points[j+1].x*points[j].y);
00043     if( A > 0 ) return true; else return false;
00044 }
00045 
00046 EGS_2DPolygon::~EGS_2DPolygon() {
00047     delete [] a; delete [] p; delete [] d; delete [] pc; delete [] uj;
00048     if( !is_convex ) {
00049         delete cpol;
00050         for(int j=0; j<ncut; j++) delete cut[j];
00051         delete [] cut;
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 EGS_2DPolygon::EGS_2DPolygon(vector<EGS_2DVector> &points, bool Open) {
00056     int n = points.size(); open = Open;
00057     EGS_2DVector test(points[0]-points[n-1]);
00058     if( test.length2() > 1e-8 ) {
00059         points.push_back(points[0]); n++;
00060     }
00061     bool ccw = checkCCW(points);
00062     // Remove points that are too close to each other.
00063     EGS_2DVector *pp = new EGS_2DVector [n];
00064     pp[0] = points[0]; int jj=1; int j;
00065     for(j=1; j<n; j++) {
00066         EGS_2DVector aux(points[j]-pp[jj-1]);
00067         if( aux.length2() > 1e-8 ) pp[jj++] = points[j];
00068     }
00069     n = jj;
00070     // now check for points on a line
00071     for(j=0; j<n-2; j++) {
00072         EGS_2DVector aa(pp[j+1]-pp[j]), bb(pp[j+2]-pp[j]);
00073         if( fabs(aa%bb) < 1e-6 ) {
00074             pp[j+1] = pp[j+2];
00075             for(int i=j+2; i<n; i++) pp[i] = pp[i+1];
00076             n--;
00077         }
00078     }
00079     np = n; p = new EGS_2DVector [np];
00080     for(j=0; j<n; j++) p[j] = pp[j];
00081     delete [] pp;
00082     // now make line normals pointing inwards.
00083     a = new EGS_2DVector [np-1]; d = new EGS_Float [np-1];
00084     uj = new EGS_2DVector [np-1];
00085     pc = new bool [np-1];
00086     xmin = 1e30, xmax = -1e30, ymin = 1e30, ymax = -1e30;
00087     for(j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00088         pc[j] = true;
00089         if( p[j].x < xmin ) xmin = p[j].x;
00090         if( p[j].x > xmax ) xmax = p[j].x;
00091         if( p[j].y < ymin ) ymin = p[j].y;
00092         if( p[j].y > ymax ) ymax = p[j].y;
00093         uj[j] = p[j+1]-p[j];
00094         if( ccw ) a[j] = EGS_2DVector(-uj[j].y,uj[j].x);
00095         else a[j] = EGS_2DVector(uj[j].y,-uj[j].x);
00096         a[j].normalize();
00097         d[j] = a[j]*p[j];
00098     }
00099     // now see if the polygon is convex
00100     is_convex = true;
00101     if( np == 4 ) return; // triangles are always convex.
00102     open = false; // we can not have open polygons
00103     for(j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00104         int j1 = j+1; if( j1 == np-1 ) j1=0;
00105         bool is_ok = true;
00106         for(int i=0; i<np-1; i++) {
00107             if( i != j && i != j1 ) {
00108                 if( !inside(j,p[i]) ) { is_ok=false; break; }
00109             }
00110         }
00111         if( !is_ok ) { is_convex = false; pc[j] = false; } //break; }
00112     }
00113 
00114     if( is_convex ) return;
00115 
00116     // find a point that is part of the convex hull of this polygon
00117     int jstart;
00118     for(j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00119         bool is_ok = true;
00120         for(int i=0; i<np; i++) {
00121             if( i < j || i > j+1 ) if( !inside(j,p[i]) ) { is_ok=false; break; }
00122         }
00123         if( is_ok ) { // found the point
00124             jstart = j;
00125             pp = new EGS_2DVector [np]; int jj=0; int i;
00126             for(i=j; i<np-1; i++) pp[jj++] = p[i];
00127             for(i=0; i<=j; i++) pp[jj++] = p[i];
00128             break;
00129         }
00130     }
00131 
00132     vector<EGS_2DVector> chull;
00133     vector<EGS_2DVector> ipol;
00134     vector<EGS_2DPolygon *> tmp_pol;
00135     chull.push_back(pp[0]); chull.push_back(pp[1]); int nc=2;
00136     j=2; bool doing_chull=true;
00137     while(1) {
00138         EGS_2DVector s(pp[j]-chull[nc-1]);
00139         EGS_2DVector sperp(-s.y,s.x);
00140         if( !ccw ) sperp *= (-1.);
00141         EGS_Float ds = sperp*chull[nc-1];
00142         bool all_inside=true;
00143         for(int i=j+1; i<n; i++) {
00144             if( sperp*pp[i] < ds ) { all_inside=false; break; }
00145         }
00146         if( all_inside ) {
00147             if( !doing_chull ) {
00148                 ipol.push_back(pp[j]);
00149                 EGS_2DPolygon *newp = new EGS_2DPolygon(ipol);
00150                 tmp_pol.push_back(newp);
00151                 ipol.clear();
00152             }
00153             doing_chull = true;
00154             chull.push_back(pp[j]); nc++;
00155         }
00156         else {
00157             if( doing_chull ) {
00158                 doing_chull = false;
00159                 ipol.push_back(chull[nc-1]);
00160             }
00161             ipol.push_back(pp[j]);
00162         }
00163         j++; if( j >= n ) break;
00164     }
00165     cpol = new EGS_2DPolygon(chull);
00166     ncut = tmp_pol.size();
00167     cut = new EGS_2DPolygon* [ncut];
00168     for(j=0; j<ncut; j++) cut[j] = tmp_pol[j];
00169     delete [] pp;
00170 }
